channel.description: Week 5 Announcements This Week Mon: Lab 2 Due 11:59 PM Mon: Discussion 1 Due 11:59 PM Oct 4?: Lab 3 Monday 7 PM Lab 2 Grading Canvas Only No Meeting Required Lab 3 Core Network Services Set IP Addresses Install DNS & DHCP Install SNMP See Hints & Diagrams Ask Questions!
